divs: Sighting DetailsI saw what I thought was a group of airplanes. The one in front was larger thanthe others. Behind it and in a semi-tight group I counted 8 smaller. They allglowed bright and I could see a solid contrail from all. These moved very fast,maybe four times as fast as every other plane I see flying. They were alsofairly low, maybe a half mile high. There was absolutely no noise from any ofthem. I what planes every night and there were a lot of them in the sky tonight.Someone had to see these. They traveled in a perfect path from one side of thehorizon to the other.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Utica
There were no other sightings in Utica on or around June 26th 2004
